name: Five jQuery Plugins for Your Grails App
description: This talk will cover the basics of jQuery (now the default JavaScript framework in Grails 2.0) and will demonstrate how to integrate some popular jQuery plugins into a Grails application quickly.  The plugins covered will be the Validation plugin for forms, dynamic tables with DataTables, trees with dynatree, calendars with FullCalendar, and history management with BBQ.
